Bibliographic References: PP, no. 253, fig. 50 and pi. 31 a; PPSupp, no. 344; L. Curtius, BABesch 29, 1954, pp. 4 ff., fig. 5; Simon, Jdl 79, 1964, p. 329, fig. 26; LIMC I, p. 79, no. 273 (with bibliography).
Imagery Description: Body: Ambush of Troilos. Shoulder: lion and panther attacking stag. Below the handles: sphinx perched on scroll and palmettes.
